info.+content: In the crime-ridden, mafia-governed city of Ergastulum, Worick and Nicolas are two "handymen" known as "Benriya" who would take any dirty job from either police or mafia -- for a good price. After an assignment from police the two met and later joined by Alex, a former prostitute who got interested in the mysterious background of the team, in particular of Nicolas' abilities.

In the mafia-governed city of Ergastalum, Nicholas Brown and Worick Arcangelo are mercenaries for hire known as "Handymen" who take on jobs from police and crime syndicates that no one else can handle. After completing an ordered killing of a local pimp's gang, the Handymen decide to spare Alex Benedetto—a woman forced into prostitution by said pimp and included as part of the kill order. They add her to their team and help her deal with drug-induced repercussions from her past life as a prostitute. Meanwhile, Ergastalum has become increasingly unsafe for "Twilights"—super-human beings born as the result of a special drug—as they are being hunted down by a fierce underground organization. As skirmishes between Twilights and opposing forces intensify, the Handymen find themselves dragged into a conflict that could tear the city apart.
"Yoru no Kuni" (夜の国; Country of the Night) by Annabel
GANGSTA.（ギャングスタ）公式 @ Twitter
